website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a LEGO set for a young car enthusiast, the numerous possibilities that this one offers are tough to beat.
pros: Has all the components needed to build 3 iconic Ferraris, a complete garage, a workshop, and racetrack
Provides lots of accessories to inspire youngsters' imagination and creativity
cons: Younger children may need a bit of help putting together some of the smaller components

customer_reviews.title: Forget about the price, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I own all of the recent Lego champion Ferrari sets and besides the semi truck set this set is my favorite. Takes a while to assemble because there are so many things and Lego people, but it's so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeOne

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this for my nephew and he loved the gift. We spent a few hour setting up the garage before we built the cars. This was a great price and thanks to prime we received the set the next day after the order was placed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Ferrari Ultimate Garage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice build. Easy to follow instructions. Cool garage set.But the cool part about the build. Was building the Ferrari 312 T4, Ferrari 488 GTE and the Ferrari 250 GTO.
customer_reviews.author: David Foster

customer_reviews.title: My grandson's favorite Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a real hit! Didn't take too long to assemble and was perfect for his collection!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbe5401

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old grandson loves cars and Legos. Perfect combination for many, many hours of creative play!
customer_reviews.author: Diesel Man

customer_reviews.title: Our grandsons wish list
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old grandson had this on his wish list, although way overpriced. But he is so Far away from us, and we cant fly to see him YET, we purchased anyway. He stated, "This is the best lego set ever" kept him busy for awhile with this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Get one while you still can
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun set for car enthusiasts. Getting super hard to find this set too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It's a fantastic Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy set for Speed Champions lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Ovcharov Yevgen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent models
customer_reviews.text: Really cool set with good models. Enjoyed building. I purchased one that was marked down as used with damaged packaging. Received a flawless brand new set.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kodadrk

customer_reviews.title: Seemed easy to build following the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my 8 year old Grandson and he loved it and it turned out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved getting this. He was so excited and had it put together in a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: JStroope

customer_reviews.title: Love Speed Champions
customer_reviews.text: Speed Champions are a great LEGO set with a ton of awesome cars all of the same scale. Not only do you get 3 Ferrari cars (race, road, classic), but you also get a garage/museum setup with a ton of mini figs. Great set even if you aren't into the speed champions series, but a must buy if you are.
customer_reviews.author: MrE

customer_reviews.title: Can you call a lego set FANCY?
customer_reviews.text: This is COOOOOL. I am going to be doing it along side my daughter as it just looks fun. Swanky race cars are just plain COOL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

customer_reviews.title: LEGO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Item for my Grandson's Birthday and he could not have been more pleased
customer_reviews.author: Theresa V.

product_meta.title: LEGO Speed Champions Ferrari Ultimate Garage 75889 Building Kit (841 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Create the LEGO Speed Champions 75889 Ferrari Ultimate Garage with a workshop/museum, attachable racetrack section and LEGO Speed Champions versions of the classic Ferrari 250 GTO, Ferrari 488 GTE and historic Ferrari 312 T4 cars. Build the cars in the workshop, featuring an adjustable car ramp, vintage-style fuel pump and a tool rack, display a car in the museum, and race around the curbs and under the arch on the racetrack section. This building set includes 7 minifigures for endless role-play options.
feature_bullets: Build 3 iconic Ferrari toy cars—the Ferrari 250 GTO, Ferrari 488 GTE and the Ferrari 312 T4, plus a workshop with a tool rack and adjustable car ramp, museum with a trophy cabinet, and a racetrack!
This Ferrari model car kit features 7 minifigures, including 3 race car drivers with helmets and a race marshal with a checkered flag element

Buildable workshop/museum measures over 3-inch (10cm) high, 8-inch (22cm) wide and 7-inch (18cm) deep, and 19-inch (50cm) wide when opened out Racetrack measures over 5-inch (13cm) high, 11-inch (30cm) wide and 19-inch (50cm) deep Ferrari 250 GTO measures over 1-inch (5cm) high, 6-inch (15cm) long and 2-inch (6cm) wide Ferrari 488 GTE measures over 1-inch (5cm) high, 6-inch (16cm) long and 2-inch (6cm) wide Ferrari 312 T4 measures over 1-inch (4cm) high, 6-inch (16cm) long and 2-inch (6cm) wide
841 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14
LEGO Speed Champions playsets are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
